function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of data augmentation techniques such as Mosaic may create a false sense of data variety and lead to overfitting if not used carefully","Impact":"Overfitting may occur, leading to poor generalization and performance on unseen data","Mitigation":"Careful evaluation of the data distribution and application of regularization techniques to counter overfitting","Technologies":"Regularization techniques, data analysis tools","People":"Machine learning practitioners, data scientists","Owner":"Machine learning team, data science team"},{"Description":"Noisy estimation of mean and variance in batch normalization due to batch size reduction","Impact":"Inaccurate normalization may lead to poor convergence and training instability","Mitigation":"Consideration of normalised values from previous k iterations and use of techniques such as Cross-Iteration Batch Normalization (CBM)","Technologies":"Batch normalization, cross-iteration batch normalization","People":"Machine learning practitioners, data scientists","Owner":"Machine learning team, data science team"},{"Description":"Selection and evaluation of activation functions may result in suboptimal model performance","Impact":"Suboptimal choice of activation function may lead to slow convergence, lower accuracy, and higher training times","Mitigation":"Thorough evaluation of multiple activation functions, including their impact on convergence, accuracy, and performance metrics","Technologies":"Activation functions, performance evaluation tools","People":"Machine learning practitioners, data scientists","Owner":"Machine learning team, data science team"}]}
